title: How to Fix Discord Overlay Not Working on Windows

steps.title: Run Discord as administrator.
steps.content: Run Discord as administrator. Fully close Discord and your game. Make sure it's not still running in the system tray. Right-click the Discord icon and select Run as administrator . You'll need to click OK to proceed. Once Discord is up again, launch the game again.

steps.title: Make sure Game Overlay is enabled in Discord.
steps.content: Make sure Game Overlay is enabled in Discord. This feature may have been toggled off in a recent update. To check, do the following: Open Discord. Click the cog icon. Click Game Overlay in the left panel. Toggle on Enable in-game overlay . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add the game to your Registered Games.
steps.content: Add the game to your Registered Games. If you're running a game that Discord doesn't recognize, you may have trouble seeing the in-game overlay. To add a game to Discord, do the following: Open Discord. Click the cog icon. Click Registered Games in the left panel. Click Add it! Click the drop-down menu and select your game. Click Add Game . Make sure the monitor icon next to the added game does not have a slash through it. If it does, click it.

steps.title: Turn off Hardware Acceleration in Discord.
steps.content: Turn off Hardware Acceleration in Discord. This feature uses other resources from your computer to make sure Discord runs more smoothly. However, this may cause issues with other games and programs. To disable it, do the following Open Discord. Click the cog icon. Click Advanced in the left panel. Toggle off Hardware Acceleration . Restart Discord.

steps.title: Temporarily disable your antivirus.
steps.content: Temporarily disable your antivirus. In some cases, your antivirus may block your game or Discord. Disable it temporarily, and then run Discord and your game again.

steps.title: Reinstall Discord.
steps.content: Reinstall Discord. If Discord's overlay still isn't working, you may have corrupted files on your end. Completely uninstall Discord, and then download it again from the website . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Discord Overlay may not work due to settings, software bugs, or incompatible games.
steps.content: Discord Overlay may not work due to settings, software bugs, or incompatible games. Certain settings, such as Hardware Acceleration, can prevent overlay from showing properly. Additionally, Discord isn't completely allowed by all antivirus software, so it may be blocked. Currently, the following games do not work with Discord Game Overlay: Age of Empires II HD, Archeage, Arma 3, Call of Duty: WWII, DayZ, Destiny 2, Dolphin, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, Elite Dangerous, Elsword, Fallout: New Vegas, Final Fantasy XIV, Forza Horizon 3, Half-Life, Killing Floor 2, Minecraft Windows 10 Edition, Paladins, PlanetSide 2, PokerStars, PCSX2, Ragnarok Online, Roblox, RuneScape, SteamVR, Street Fighter V, and Warface.
